import React from 'react' import { IoAirplaneSharp } from 'react-icons/io5' import { FlightInfo } from '../../models/FlightInfo' import { parseISO, differenceInMinutes, formatDistanceToNow } from 'date-fns'; type FlightInfoProps = { flightInfo: FlightInfo } const InfoFlight: React.FC = ({ flightInfo }) => { return (
{ (typeof flightInfo.far !== 'number' || typeof flightInfo.dflownNumber !== 'number' || typeof flightInfo.dtoGoNumber !== 'number') || (!flightInfo.far || !flightInfo.dflownNumber || !flightInfo.dtoGoNumber) ?
Can't show result
:
{ `${calculateTimeDifference(flightInfo.flight.departure?.actual ?? '').hours} h ${calculateTimeDifference(flightInfo.flight.departure?.actual ?? '').minutes} m` }
{Math.round(flightInfo.dflownNumber)}
{Math.round(flightInfo.far)} total travel
{ // `${calculateTimeDifference(flightInfo.flight.arrival?.estimated ?? '').hours} h ${calculateTimeDifference(flightInfo.flight.arrival?.estimated ?? '').minutes} m` }
{Math.round(flightInfo.dtoGoNumber)}
}
) } export default InfoFlight
